main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported near Laredo, Texas on July 25, 1964.
interesting points: Mr. reported a UFO at 2210 hours, Mrs. reported a UFO at 2155 hours., A call was received at 2057 hours from Maj Cockerill regarding a civilian sighting., The object was described as round with a reddish glow., The object was visible for about 2-3 minutes and was seen at a high rate of speed.
sighted object: round object with a reddish glow
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. who reported sightings, and a civilian caller to Maj Cockerill
